member.name: T:Boxfusion.Health.His.Bookings.Domain.AppointmentBookingManager
member.summary: Domain Service for managing Appointments specifically where they belong to schedules where Schedule.SchedulingModel is Appointment Booking.

member.name: M:Boxfusion.Health.His.Bookings.Domain.AppointmentBookingManager.BookAvailableSlotAsync(System.Guid,System.DateTime,System.Nullable{System.Int64},System.Nullable{System.Guid},System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Creates a new Appointment to book the first available Slot for the specified schedule and requestedTime.
member.returns: Returns the appointment created to book the requested time. Will return null if a slot at that time was not found.

member.name: M:Boxfusion.Health.His.Bookings.Domain.AppointmentBookingManager.BookAvailableSlotAsync(System.Guid,Boxfusion.Health.Cdm.Appointments.CdmAppointment)
member.summary: Creates a new Appointment to book the first available Slot for the specified schedule and requestedTime.

member.name: M:Boxfusion.Health.His.Bookings.Domain.AppointmentBookingManager.FindAvailableBookingSlot(System.Guid,System.DateTime)
member.summary: Returns the first Available booking slot within the specified Schedule for the specified time and SlotType
member.returns: Returns the first slot found, otherwise returns null.

member.name: M:Boxfusion.Health.His.Bookings.Domain.AppointmentBookingManager.GetAllAvailableBookingSlotsAsync(System.Guid,System.DateTime,System.DateTime)
member.summary: Returns a list of all Slots with available capacity that start and end between the specified dates and for the specified Schedule.

member.name: M:Boxfusion.Health.His.Bookings.Domain.AppointmentBookingManager.GetAllBookingSlotsAsync(System.Guid,System.DateTime,System.DateTime)
member.summary: Returns a list of all Slots for the specified scheduled within the specified dates regardless of available capacity.

member.name: M:Boxfusion.Health.His.Bookings.Domain.AppointmentBookingManager.CancelAppointment(System.Guid)
member.summary: Cancels the specified Appointment.
member.param: Id of the appointment to cancel.

member.name: M:Boxfusion.Health.His.Bookings.Domain.AppointmentBookingManager.RescheduleAppointment(System.Guid,System.DateTime,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: RescheduleAppointment the specified Appointment.
member.param: Id of the appointment to cancel.
member.returns: If successfully rescheduled, returns the updated Appointment entity. If could not reschedule due to unavailability of slots at the requested tiem then will return null.

member.name: M:Boxfusion.Health.His.Bookings.Domain.AppointmentBookingManager.ConfirmAppointmentArrival(System.Guid)
member.summary: Confirms Arrival of the the specified Appointment.

member.name: T:Boxfusion.Health.His.Bookings.Domain.FlattenedFacilityAppointment
member.summary: Flattened version of the Appointment entity joining in fields from the Patient and Schedule entities. Note: The DB view behind this entity only returns Facility based appointments i.e. where the Owner of the schedule the appointment relates to is Health Facility

member.name: T:Boxfusion.Health.His.Bookings.Domain.BookingSlotsGenerator

member.summary: Generate booking slots for the specified Schedule accross all its ScheduleAvailabilities
member.param: Id of the schedule for which slots should be generated.
